text: Rub-dub-dub two kids in the tub Members of the Bathtime Club!

Scrub-dub-dub in the tub how we love
The Bathtime Club!

Rubber duckie swim
Penguin race with him --go!

Mommy, look at me (and me!)
Sailors out at sea

In our red sailboat
Up and down we float
Rub-dub-dub two kids in the tub Members of the Bathtime Club!

Scrub-dub-dub in the tub how we love
The Bathtime Club!

Ride our submarine
Til we're squeaky clean

Up, up Periscope
Rinsing off the soap
Rub-dub-dub two kids in the tub Members of the Bathtime Club!

Scrub-dub-dub in the tub how we love
The Bathtime Club!

Mommy dries us off
With a towel so soft

"Now it's story time!"
Into bed we climb
Rub-dub-dub two kids in the tub Members of the Bathtime Club!

Scrub-dub-dub in the tub how we love
The Bathtime Club!
Rub-dub-dub two kids in the tub Members of the Bathtime Club!

Scrub-dub-dub in the tub how we love
The Bathtime Club!
